description: Java class PojoJavaCodeProducer responsible for generating Java code for POJOs and Enums based on wrappers and templates within the project. It handles code generation, file creation, and manages dependencies and imports for POJO classes.

classes.name: PojoJavaCodeProducer
classes.description: Class handling the generation of Java code for POJOs and Enums, extending PojoCodeProducer to implement code writing functionalities based on wrappers.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method that orchestrates generation process for POJO and Enum wrappers, including assigning names and generating code files.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Generates Java source files for individual POJO or Enum wrappers and saves the files to disk.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Creates the Java source code content for a given wrapper by applying templates and mappings.

methods.name: assignNames
methods.description: Calculates class, package, and filename names for a wrapper, setting them into its ContextJava.
